name: Dune and Run
description:
-----📜 Description 📜----

Dune and Run is a relaxing open world free-exploration game where you have to explore a vast desert and find ancient places, lost cities, animals and much more!

You can chill yourself by hearing a background music while walking through sand and also you have the oppurtunity do good actions. Indeed you will find thirsty npcs on the way; if you give the water, they will reward you with an honorific title. 

What you will find in the game

  • Cute animals through the map 🐪
  • Npcs to help 🆘
  • Music to chill out 🎵
  • A quite big map to explore 🌴
  • Places and locations to find 🏺
  • A game to relax with 😌

Dowload now!
